title: Immune System Resource Guide: Six-Part Series
author: TCIM
description: Dr. Vellinga and Dr. Lundquist recently put together a great series of articles on the Immune System that provide much needed insight into..
cleaned_text: With the spotlight still on COVID-19, people are paying attention to keeping their immune system healthy. Dr. Vellinga and Dr. Lundquist recently put together a great series of articles on the Immune System that provide much needed insight into what it takes to maintain a healthy immune system and important supplement recommendations. Part-1: [How to Strengthen Your Immune System](https://www.tcimedicine.com/post/how-to-strengthen-your-immune-system-part-1) Part-2: [How Does the Immune System Work?](https://www.tcimedicine.com/post/how-does-the-immune-system-work) Immune Boosting Supplements](https://www.tcimedicine.com/post/essential-immune-boosting-supplements) Part-5: [Important That Help Your Body Heal](https://www.tcimedicine.com/post/important-immune-boosting-supplements-that-help-your-body-heal) Part-6: [Children: Essential Supplements to Boost Your Child's Immune System](https://www.tcimedicine.com/post/children-essential-supplements-to-boost-your-childs-immune-system) Coronavirus Resource Articles: [How to reduce your risk for SARS-COV 2 ](https://www.tcimedicine.com/post/resource-links-how-to-reduce-your-risk-for-sars-cov-2-but-still-see-family-and-friends) Resource Video and Guide [Coronavirus: Symptoms, Prevention, and Immune Boosting Recommendations](https://www.tcimedicine.com/post/coronavirus-2019-symptoms-prevention-and-immune-boosting-recommendations) The Temecula Center for Integrative Medicine is an Integrative Medical Clinic specializing in all aspects of Functional Medicine.
